Messages.Text: Hi! I placed an order on your website and I can't find the tracking number. Can you help me find out where my package is?
I think I used my email address to log in.
How can I help you?
My battery exploded!
It's on fire, it's melting the carpet!
What should I do!
How can I help you?
I'm interested in upgrading my plan.
Can you tell me a bit about Prime?
My friend has it, and it seems like a great deal
How can I help you?
Hello
Hello Werner how may I help you today?
I have recently moved to a new apartment and would like to update my contact details
Sure I can help you with that? Could you please provide me with your new address?
Ok, 5 Seaman Ave, Apt 3F, New York, New York, 10034
Let me update that information on our system
OK Wernzio, I have updated your address to the system
Great, thank. I also need to place a order for a new installation as the place I live currently does not have the required wiring
Ok let me go ahead and request a work order for a new installation. Give me a moment...
OK a installation order has been places. Seems the earilest we will be able to help you  is from the 20th February onwards
does that suite you?
Yes. It soes
good, I have scheduled. A operator will be contacted you one day prior to lock down a time slot.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
No that is it right now.
Great, was my pleasure helping you. Have a great day Wernzio
How can I help you?
Hey Acme, I am having problems with my cable tv...
Hey Wernzio, What problems are you experiencing?
From like a hour ago my able service just stopped workig
Interesting, let me quickly have a look what the status for your neighborhood is.
Give me a moment
It seems currently we are experiencing technical problems in near your vicinity.
We have sent out a technician and expect to have the problem resolved within the next 30min. I am sorry for the inconveniences.
Not a problem.
So my service should be resolve within he next 30 min?
Give or take a few minutes. If you wish to check in later what the status is just contact us again.
Can I assist you with anything else?
No I am fine thanks..
In that case have a good night further Wernzio.
